PROJECTS  
 
 
1. Pureminutes : 
 
Role  : Coding, Development, Implementation.  
Skills Used  : Vb.net, API integration, DB communication  
 
Description:  
 
                www.pureminutes.com  site enables the user to make interna tional call much easier with low rates. This site enable 
the Guest user to get registered with www.pureminutes.com  .Enable them to make recharge. Allow the registered user to avail 
extra feature of speed dial fea ture and Refer and Earn credit. The Auto recharge process facility make to user to enjoy services 
without disconnection.

● User Creation with Pin generation and with needed security access  
● SMS API integration  
● Credit Card Payment through Authorize.net CIM  
● Speed dial with Logic of getting nearest access number allocation  
● Report creation using SSRS
